mapper.insert: insert into tag(tno, name, photo, tag_color, font_color) values(#{no}, #{name}, #{photo}, #{tagColor}, #{fontColor})
mapper.sql: select tno, name, photo, tag_color, font_color, state from tag
mapper.select: select t.tno, t.name, t.photo, t.tag_color, t.font_color, t.state from tag t inner join usr_tag ut on ut.tno = t.tno where #{no} = ut.uno order by tno desc;
